scripts.postinstall: npm run debug-link && npm run install:
scripts.install:: npm run install:core && npm run install:action-preset && npm run install:dev-server && npm run install:create-app
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run build && lerna publish --force-publish
scripts.link:: npm run link:core && npm run link:action-preset && npm run link:dev-server && npm run link:create-app
scripts.link:action-preset: cd ./dist/action-preset && yarn link nickelcat && yarn link && cd ..
scripts.link:dev-server: cd ./dist/dev-server && yarn link nickelcat && yarn link nickelcat-action-preset && yarn link && cd ..
scripts.link:create-app: cd ./dist/create-app && yarn link nickelcat && yarn link && cd ..
